name: Godot 3.2 Gles 2 Test
description:
Testing the  latest stable release of Godot 3.2.

So far it is running good in my Huawei P20 Pro. Haven't tested it to lower-end devices. If you are interest to try, you can download the attached apk. 

Note I haven't done any optimization for this test project. I'm also using Godot's default export template for android.
